item.title: Installing RStudio
item.description: Downloading RStudio RStudio Desktop - http://www.rstudio.com RStudio Integrated Development Environment (IDE) RStudio is an IDE that consolidates everything you need to write R code and work with data in a single app. It allows you to browse help files, plots, and keep track of objects in your environment easily.
